content.rendered:
WyoFile is committed to keeping residents informed about the legality of abortion in Wyoming. 

That means we’ll continue to follow federal, state and local policy changes that could affect abortion access in Wyoming.  

Check out our ongoing coverage and timeline below.

Latest news

Wyoming Supreme Court mulls constitutionality of state’s abortion bans

by Maggie Mullen and Andrew Graham April 16, 2025April 16, 2025

Casper abortion clinic remains in limbo as judge mulls temporary halt to new regulations

by Joshua Wolfson April 8, 2025April 8, 2025

Latest Wyoming abortion law challenge gets a hearing — and a new judge

by Joshua Wolfson April 2, 2025April 3, 2025
